comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of gas grills and y be the number of electric grills, both integers",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0",
        "20x + 30y \geq 150",
        "20x + 25y \leq 140",
        "y \leq x"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize Z = x + y"
}
